00030 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( RawQTest );
00031 
00032 void RawQTest::setUp()
00033 {
00034 }

00036 void RawQTest::tearDown()

00039 
00040 void RawQTest::testProperties()
00041 {
00042         const double eps = 1e-10;
00043         CRawQ r;
00044 
00045         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.GetVerticalZones() == 4);
00046         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.GetHorizontalZones() == 4);
00047         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(r.GetPercentBG(), 2.0, eps);
00048 
00049         r.SetVerticalZones(1);
00050         r.SetHorizontalZones(2);
00051         r.SetPercentBG(3.0f);
00052 
00053         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.GetVerticalZones() == 1);
00054         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.GetHorizontalZones() == 2);
00055         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(r.GetPercentBG(), 3.0, eps);
00056 
00057         r.SetDefaults();
00058 
00059         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.GetVerticalZones() == 4);
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.GetHorizontalZones() == 4);
00061         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(r.GetPercentBG(), 2.0, eps);
00062 }
00063 
00064 void RawQTest::testCompute()
00065 {
00066         const double eps = 1e-6;
00067         CRawQ r;
00068         affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData cel;
00069         cel.SetFileName("./data/Test3.CEL");
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cel.Read() == true);
00071 
00072         affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCDFData cdf;
00073         cdf.SetFileName("./data/Test3.CDF");
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cdf.Read() == true);
00075 
00076         float rq = r.ComputeRawQ(cel, cdf);
00077 
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(rq, 6.3773966, eps);
00079 }
